Three Ukrainian soldiers were killed and another nine were wounded during a battle drill in [[Rivne Oblast]] at around 5:55 am 6 July.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/06/pid-chas-navchan-na-rivnenskomu-poligoni-zaginuli-tri-ta-otrimali-poranennya-devyat-vijskovosluzhbovcziv/ |title=Під час навчань на Рівненському полігоні загинули три та отримали поранення дев’ять військовослужбовців |trans-title= |date=6 July 2018 |accessdate=6 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.rferl.org/a/three-ukrainian-soldiers-die-in-training-accident/29346638.html |title=Three Ukrainian Soldiers Die In Training Accident |publisher=[[Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty|REF/RL]] |date=6 July 2018 |accessdate=6 July 2018}} The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded in the Donbass region on 5 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/06/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-06-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 06 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 6 July 2018|date=6 July 2018 |accessdate=6 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 13:18 06/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded five Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in five different locations using small arms, automatic grenade launchers and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-pyat-raz-narushili-rezhim-prekrashheniya-ognya-stskk/|title=ВСУ пять раз нарушили режим прекращения огня - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=6 July 2018|website=Официальный сайт ДНР|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=5 July 2018}} The same sources recorded 49 Ukrainian violations of the truce over the past week. The Ukrainian military fired six tank rounds, 2 antitank guided missiles, 54 82 mm and 120 mm mortar shells and 64 shots from armoured fighting vehicles on the same period. One pro-Russian soldier was killed in action.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/06/vsu-za-nedelyu-poryadka-50-raz-narushili-rezhim-tishiny-v-dnr/|title=ВСУ за неделю порядка 50 раз нарушили режим тишины в ДНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-08|language=ru-RU}} Officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire four times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Zholobok, Pryshyb and Lozove.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/06/vsu-4-raza-narushili-rezhim-tishiny-v-lnr/|title=ВСУ 4 раза нарушили режим тишины в ЛНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-07|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 8 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded by a sniper bullet at [[Krasnohorivka]].{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/403949736764315 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 06 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=2018-07-06 |accessdate=2018-07-06 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 30 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city, Ukrainian positions at Avdiivka, Novoselivka, Novotroitske and Kamianka were fired at from small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. Sniper fire was reported at Krasnohorivka. In the region of Mariupol, Shyrokyne was hit by 82 mm mortar rounds and antitank guided missiles. Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Lebedinske, Vodiane, Shyrokyne and Bohdanivka. In the northern section of the demarcation line, pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles attacked Novhorodske, while Krymske, Troitske, Katerinivka, Yuzhne, Novoluhanske and Svitlodarsk became the target of heavy machine guns and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/07/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-07-00-07-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Ранкове зведення на 07:00 07 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-07 |access-date=2018-07-07 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10178819-joint-forces-report-30-ceasefire-violations-by-russia-proxy-forces-in-past-day.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Joint forces report 30 ceasefire violations by Russia proxy forces in past day {{!}} The situation was tense in the Mariupol sector with a large number of enemy provocations. |date=7 July 2018 |accessdate=7 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2494420-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-30-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 30 times in last day |date=7 July 2018 |accessdate=7 July 2018}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city reported a number of ceasefire violations by the Ukrainian military throughout the day. Dokuchaievsk, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, and in the region of Mariupol Petrovske and Sakhanka were attacked by Ukrainian forces. In the main incidents, Dokuchaievsk was hit by 120 mm mortar rounds, while Sakhanka came under 82 mm mortar fire.{{Cite web|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-dokuchaevsk-stskk-7/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Докучаевск - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=6 July 2018|website=Официальный сайт ДНР|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=6 July 2018}}{{Cite web|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-sahanke-stskk/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Саханке|last=|first=|date=6 July 2018|website=Официальный сайт ДНР|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=6 July 2018}} === 7 July === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 30 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 18 occasions in Donetsk and on 12 occasions in Luhansk region). By morning of 7 July (as of 11:00 am) three ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded in the Donbass region on 6 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/07/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-07-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 07 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 7 July 2018|date=7 July 2018 |accessdate=7 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:45 07/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported six Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in six different locations using small arms, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32111|title=Wall|website=vk.com|access-date=2018-07-07}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when automatic grenade launchers were fired at pro-Russian positions near Lozove.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/07/lnr-operativnaya-svodka-obstrelyan-poselok-lozovoe-zhertv-net/|title=ЛНР: оперативная сводка – обстрелян поселок Лозовое, жертв нет|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-07|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 2 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/406561763169779 |title=ЗВЕДЕННЯ СТАНОМ НА 18:00 07 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=7 July 2018 |accessdate=7 July 2018 |publisher=JFO |language=uk|website=www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news}} By the end of the day total 13 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city, separatist troops fired infantry weapons and grenade launchers at Ukrainian positions in Krasnohorivka, Novotroitske and Pisky. The same kind of weapons were used in the region of Mariupol to attack Ukrainian forces at Vodiane, Shyrokyne and Pyshchevik. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Krymske was hit by heavy machine gun fire and antitank rockets. Ukrainian troops at Stari Aidar and Novoluhanske were harassed with small arms fire.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/08/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-07-00-08-lipnya-2018/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07.00 08 липня 2018 |trans-title= |date=8 July 2018 |accessdate=8 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10179344-donbas-update-militants-violate-truce-along-almost-entire-contact-line.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Donbas update: Militants violate truce along almost entire contact line {{!}} Ukraine reported no losses over the past 24 hours. |date=8 July 2018 |accessdate=8 July 2018}} Pro-Russian authorities from Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire on a number of occasions. The Ukrainian military opened fire at Dokuchaievsk and Staromykhailivka, in the surroundings of Donetsk city, and Sakhanka, in the region of Mariupol. In the main incidents, pro-Russian positions at Sakhanka were shelled with 82 mm mortars, while small arms, automatic grenade launchers, rocket launchers and 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles were fired at Staromykhailivka from Ukrainian positions at Krasnohorivka. Antitank rockets hit pro-Russian redoubts at Dokuchaievsk.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-vsu-po-napravleniiu-novotroitckoe-dokuchaevsk-2/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Новотроицкое - Докучаевск|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-08}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-shirokino-sakhanka/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Широкино - Саханка|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-08}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-vsu-po-napravleniiu-krasnogorovka-staromikhailovka/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Красногоровка - Старомихайловка|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-08}} === 8 July === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 13 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 10 occasions in Donetsk region and on 3 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 4 occasions. By morning of 8 July five ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side; the fire was not returned. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 7 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/08/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-08-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 08 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 8 July 2018|date=8 July 2018 |accessdate=8 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 13:37 08/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded four Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, antitank rockets, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 82 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/dnr_online_ru?w=wall-95168042_32124|title=Wall|website=vk.com|access-date=2018-07-09}} No violations of the ceasefire were reported inside the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/08/v-lnr-soobshhili-chto-peremirie-soblyudaetsya/|title=В ЛНР сообщили, что перемирие соблюдается|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-09|language=ru-RU}} According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO in the evening pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 5 occasions between 7:00 am and 6:00 pm, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded by a [[grenade]] from a [[GP-25]] under-barrel [[grenade launcher]] that hit a trench at [[Pivdenne (Toretsk)|Pivdenne]].{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/407535486405740 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 08 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=2018-07-08 |accessdate=2018-07-08 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 21 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city, the separatists opened fire on Ukrainian positions at Avdiivka and Marinka with small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. In the region of Mariupol, The same kind of weapons were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Vodiane, Lebedinske, Talakivka, Pavlopil and Shyrokyne. In the northern section of the demarcation line, pro-Russian forces attacked Ukrainian positions at Krymske and Svitlodarsk with infantry weapons and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/09/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-07-00-09-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Ранкове зведення на 07:00 09 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-09 |access-date=2018-07-09 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10179920-jfo-ukraine-reports-1-wia-amid-21-enemy-attacks-in-donbas-in-past-day.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=JFO: Ukraine reports 1 WIA amid 21 enemy attacks in Donbas in past day {{!}} According to intelligence reports, two occupiers were wounded. |date=9 July 2018 |accessdate=9 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2494976-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-21-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 21 times in last day |date=9 July 2018 |accessdate=9 July 2018}}{{Cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/09/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-09-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru|title=ООС: сводные данные – 09 июля 2018 – Информационно-аналитический центр|website=mediarnbo.org|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-07-09}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire on two occasions by night, when Vesele and Dokuchaievsk, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, were hit by small arms and heavy machine gun fire. Two civilian residences were damaged by [[Tracer ammunition|tracers]]. === 9 July === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 21 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day, exclusively in Donetsk region. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded in the Donbass region on 8 July.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/09/brifing-predstavnika-pres-czentru-obednanih-sil-09-07-2018-r/ |title=Брифінг представника Прес-центру Об’єднаних сил 09.07.2018 р. |trans-title= |date=9 July 2018 |accessdate=9 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city reported two Ukrainian violations of the truce in two locations, both of them involving small arms and heavy machine guns.{{Cite news|url=https://regnum.ru/news/2444985.html|title=Украинские каратели сожгли один дом в ДНР|work=ИА REGNUM|access-date=2018-07-09|language=ru-RU}} For the second consecutive day, no violations of the ceasefire were recorded by local authorities in the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/09/ognevaya-gruppa-vsu-obnaruzhena-na-linii-soprikosnoveniya-lnr/|title=Огневая группа ВСУ обнаружена на линии соприкосновения — ЛНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. In the surroundings of Donetsk city, Ukrainian positions at Nevelske, Avdiivka, Novotroitske, Pisky and Opytne were hit by heavy machine gun fire and antitank rockets. In the northern sector of tbe demarcation line, Svitlodarsk came under intense heavy machine gun fire. The Ukrainian stronghold also became the target of rocket launchers. The separatists used infantry weapons to attack Ukrainian positions at Novozvanivka and Novoluhanske.{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10181507-jfo-ukrainian-soldier-wounded-amid-23-enemy-attacks-in-donbas-in-past-day.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=JFO: Ukrainian soldier wounded amid 23 enemy attacks in Donbas in past day {{!}} According to intelligence reports, a militant of the Russian occupation forces was killed. |date=10 July 2018 |accessdate=10 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2495659-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-23-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 23 times in last day |date=10 July 2018 |accessdate=10 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/10/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-07-00-10-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07.00 10 липня 2018 |trans-title= |date=10 July 2018 |accessdate=10 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian officials reported a number of Ukrainian violations of the truce by evening. In the area of Horlivka, Dolomitne was shelled by 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles firing from Novoluhanske; in the region of Mariupol, Uzhivka was hit by 120 mm mortar rounds, while Sakhanka came under attack from BMP-2 armoured fighting vehicles from Lebedinske, supported by 82 mm mortar fire.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovany-obstrely-vsu-po-dvum-napravleniiam-2/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Новолуганское - Доломитное|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-09}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovany-obstrely-vsu-po-dvum-napravleniiam-3/|title=Зафиксированы обстрелы ВСУ по двум направлениям|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-09}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic announced that OSCE monitors confirmed that Ukrainian troops had occupied the village of Zolote-4, within the buffer zone.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/09/missiya-obse-podtverdila-chto-zolotoe-4-nahodilos-pod-kontrolem-vsu/|title=Миссия ОБСЕ подтвердила, что Золотое-4 находилось под контролем ВСУ|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-09|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the Ministry of Defence reported the following casualties during the past week (the 27th week of 2018, from Monday the 2nd of July until Monday morning of the 9th of July): seven Ukrainian soldiers were wounded in action.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/en/news/2018/07/09/briefing-ministry-of-defence-of-ukraine-spokesperson-on-frontline-situation/ |title=Briefing Ministry of Defence of Ukraine spokesperson on frontline situation|date=2018-07-02 |accessdate=2018-07-02 |publisher=2018-07-02 |quote= |first1= |last1= |location= }} === 10 July === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 23 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 19 occasions in Donetsk region and on 4 occasions in Luhansk region). In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Novoluhanske, Krymske, Novotoshkivke and Zalizne became the target of infantry weapons and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/15/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-15-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 15 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-15 |access-date=2018-07-15 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian authorities told the press by evening that Ukrainian forces from Novotroitske had shelled Dokuchaievsk, south of Donetsk city, with automatic grenade launchers and antitank rocket launchers.{{Cite news|url=https://www.donetsk.kp.ru/online/news/3174498/|title=После непродолжительно затишья, Докучаевск опять пострадал от обстрела|last=правды»|first=Цесанна АНТОНЕНКО {{!}} Сайт «Комсомольской|date=2018-07-14|work=KP.RU - сайт «Комсомольской правды»|access-date=2018-07-14|language=ru}} Vasiilivka was also hit from infantry weapons and automatic grenade launchers.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32250|title=ВСУ обстреливали Васильевку и Докучаевск - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-15}} === 15 July === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 23 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 13 occasions in Donetsk and on 10 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 5 occasions. By morning of 15 July seven ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side; the fire was returned twice. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 14 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/15/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-15-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 15 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 15 July 2018|date=15 July 2018 |accessdate=15 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:34 15/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials in Donetsk city recorded three Ukrainian violations of the truce. The Ukrainian military used small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers and antitank rocket launchers to attack pro-Russian positions at Dokuchaievsk and Vasiilivka. Officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire three times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Zholobok, Slavyanoserbsk and Sokolniki.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2366-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-14-na-15-iyulja-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 14 на 15 июля от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-07-15}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 5 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/413685592457396 |title=ЗВЕДЕННЯ СТАНОМ НА 18:00 15 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=15 July 2018 |accessdate=15 July 2018 |publisher=JFO |language=uk|website=www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news}} By the end of the day total 29 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded. In the area around Donetsk city, Ukrainian troops at Avdiivka, Taramchuk and Pisky were harassed with small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and rocket propelled grenades. In the region of Mariupol, 82 mm mortar volleys landed in Hnutove and Lebedinske, while infantry weapons and rcoket launchers were fired at Ukrainian positions around Talakivka, Pyshchevik, Vodiane and Shyrokyne. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Ukrainian positions at Krymske, Zaitseve, Mayorsk, Svitlodarsk and Novoluhanske were hit by small arms fire, heavy machine guns fire and antitank rockets.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/16/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-16-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07.00 16 липня 2018 |trans-title= |date=16 July 2018 |accessdate=16 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10188735-jfo-ukraine-reports-1-wia-amid-29-enemy-attacks-in-donbas-in-past-day.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=JFO: Ukraine reports 1 WIA amid 29 enemy attacks in Donbas in past day {{!}} According to intelligence reports, one enemy troop was killed and another one was wounded. |date=16 July 2018 |accessdate=16 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2499299-one-defender-wounded-in-29-attacks-on-ukrainian-positions-in-donbas.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=One defender wounded in 29 attacks on Ukrainian positions in Donbas |date=16 July 2018 |accessdate=16 July 2018}} === 16 July === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 29 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 16 occasions in Donetsk region and on 13 occasions in Luhansk region). By morning of 16 July seven ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded in the Donbass region on 15 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/16/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-16-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 16 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 16 July 2018|date=16 July 2018 |accessdate=16 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:32 16/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials in Donetsk city recorded two Ukrainian violations of the truce. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, small arms fire and antitank rockets hit Ukrainian positions at Svitlodarsk and Krymske.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/17/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-17-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 17 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-17 |access-date=2018-07-17 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10190304-donbas-update-ukraine-reports-1-wia-amid-19-enemy-attacks.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Donbas update: Ukraine reports 1 WIA amid 19 enemy attacks {{!}} According to intelligence reports, two enemy troops were wounded. |date=17 July 2018 |accessdate=17 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2500054-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-19-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 19 times in last day |date=17 July 2018 |accessdate=17 July 2018}} Pro-Russian authorities from Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire on a series of occasions throughout the day. By morning of 19 July five ceasefire violations were registered. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 18 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/19/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-19-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 19 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 19 July 2018|date=19 July 2018 |accessdate=19 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:49 19/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in five different locations using small arms, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/dnr_online_ru?w=wall-95168042_32299|title=За сутки ВСУ нарушили перемирие семь раз, есть повреждения - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-19}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles were fired at pro-Russian positions near Lozove.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/19/lnr-operativnaya-svodka-obstrelyan-poselok-lozovoe/|title=ЛНР: оперативная сводка — обстрелян поселок Лозовое|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-19|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 5 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/417313495427939 |title=ЗВЕДЕННЯ СТАНОМ НА 18:00 19 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=19 July 2018 |accessdate=19 July 2018 |publisher=JFO |language=uk|website=www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news}} By the end of the day total 18 ceasefire violations were registered. In all cases, separatist forces opened fire with small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. Novotroitske, Novomykhailivka, Avdiivka, Kamianka and Pisky, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, Vodiane, Lebedinske, Hnutove and Shyrokyne, in the region of Mariupol, and in the northern sector of the demarcation line, Svitlodarsk, Zhovte, Krymske, Mayorsk and Luhanske.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/20/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-20-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07.00 20 липня 2018 |trans-title= |date=20 July 2018 |accessdate=20 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2502349-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-18-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 18 times in last day |date=20 July 2018 |accessdate=20 July 2018}} A series of Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire were reported by pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city by evening. Dokuchaievsk and Novomykhailivka, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, and Pikuzy, in the region of Mariupol, came under hostile fire. In the main incidents, BMP-2 armoured vehicles engaged Ukrainian forces at Dokuchaievsk and Pikuzy, while Novomykhailivka became the target of automatic grenade launchers and antitank rocket launchers. The [[dolomite]] processing plant at Dokuchaievsk was damaged.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/vsu-vnov-obstrelivaiut-dokuchaevsk-stckk/|title=ВСУ вновь обстреливают Докучаевск - СЦКК|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-20}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-vsu-po-napravleniiu-talakovka-kominternovo-1/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Талаковка - Коминтерново|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-20}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovany-ocherednye-mnogochislennye-obstrely-so-storony-vsu-1/|title=Зафиксированы очередные многочисленные обстрелы со стороны ВСУ|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-20}}{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/dnr_online_ru?w=wall-95168042_32309|title=В результате обстрела со стороны ВСУ Докучаевска зафиксированы повреждения на флюсо-доломитном комбинате — СЦКК|last=|first=|date=|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-20}} === 20 July === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 18 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 12 occasions in Donetsk region and on 6 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 20 July two ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 19 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/20/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-20-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 20 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 20 July 2018|date=20 July 2018 |accessdate=20 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:56 20/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded four Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/ezhednevnaia-svodka-narushenii-rezhima-prekrashcheniia-ognia-za-period-s-3-00-19-iiunia-po-3-00-20-iiulia-stckk/|title=Ежедневная сводка нарушений режима прекращения огня за период с 3:00 19 июня по 3:00 20 июля - СЦКК|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-20}} The same sources reported 30 Ukrainian violations for the past week. Ukrainian forces fired 44 shells from 82 mm and 120 mm mortars and 232 rounds from armoured fighting vehicles. One pro-Russian soldier was killed in action and another wounded. Two civilian residents were injured.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/20/kievskie-siloviki-za-nedelyu-30-raz-narushili-rezhim-tishiny-v-dnr/|title=Киевские силовики за неделю 30 раз нарушили режим тишины в ДНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-20|language=ru-RU}} In the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic, local authorities recorded two Ukrainian attacks on pro-Russian positions. Automatic grenade launchers and 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles were fired at Sentianivka and Lozove.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/operativnaia-svodka-za-sutki-s-19-na-20-iiulia-ot-nm-lnr/|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 19 на 20 июля от НМ ЛНР|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-07-20}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 8 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/418326465326642 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 20 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-20 |accessdate=2018-07-20 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 29 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, another two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city, infantry weapons and grenade launchers were used to engage Ukrainian positions at Krasnohorivka, Avdiivka, Novomykhailivka, Marinka and Berezove. Sniper fire was recorded at Krasnohorivka. In the region of Mariupol, antitank guided missiles were launched at Pavlopil. Hnutove was meanwhile shelled with 120 mm mortars. The separatists fired small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers at Lebedinske, Shyrokyne, Bohdanivka, Vodiane, Pavlopil and Talakivka. In the northern section of the demarcation line, pro-Russian infantry attacked Ukrainian positions at Troitske, Svitlodarsk and Luhanske with small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/21/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-21-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 21 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-21 |access-date=2018-07-21 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10196232-donbas-update-3-ukrainian-troops-wounded-in-enemy-shelling.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Donbas update: 3 Ukrainian troops wounded in enemy shelling {{!}} Russian proxy forces opened fire on Ukraine positions 29 times over the past 24 hours. |date=21 July 2018 |accessdate=21 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2503132-militants-violated-ceasefire-in-eastern-ukraine-29-times-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire in eastern Ukraine 29 times in last day |date=21 July 2018 |accessdate=21 July 2018}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city reported several Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire throughout the day. Ukrainian forces attacked Dokuchaievsk, Yasne and Trudivske, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, Zaitseve, in the area of Horlivka, and in the region of Mariupol, Sosnovske, Pikuzy and Uzhivka. In the main incidents, a single 82 mm mortar round damaged a civilian residence at Zaitseve, while BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Novotroitske raked Ukrainian positions at Dokuchaievsk with 30 mm gunfire. An industrial depot and an [[electric locomotive]] were damaged. BMP-1 and BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Berezove also launched an attack on nearby Yasne. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that three Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 20 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/21/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-21-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 21 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 21 July 2018|date=21 July 2018 |accessdate=21 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:53 21/07/2018}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city recorded seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in seven different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2440-ezhednevnaja-svodka-narushenii-rezhima-prekraschenija-ognja-za-period-s-3-00-20-iyulja-po-3-00-.html|title=ЕЖЕДНЕВНАЯ СВОДКА НАРУШЕНИЙ РЕЖИМА ПРЕКРАЩЕНИЯ ОГНЯ ЗА ПЕРИОД С 3:00 20 ИЮЛЯ ПО 3:00 21 ИЮЛЯ от СЦКК|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-07-22}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when Kalynove was fired at from heavy machine guns and 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/21/lnr-operativnaya-svodka-obstrelyan-poselok-kalinovo-2/|title=ЛНР: оперативная сводка – обстрелян поселок Калиново|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-22|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 4 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/419276018565020 |title=ЗВЕДЕННЯ СТАНОМ НА 18:00 21 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ |trans-title= |date=21 July 2018 |accessdate=21 July 2018 |publisher=JFO |language=uk|website=www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news}} By the end of the day total 15 ceasefire violations were registered. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Ukrainian forces at Prichepilivka, Krymske and Mayorsk were harassed with small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/22/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-22-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07.00 22 липня 2018 |trans-title= |date=22 July 2018 |accessdate=22 July 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10196763-ukraine-s-army-reports-15-enemy-attacks-in-donbas-in-past-day.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Ukraine's army reports 15 enemy attacks in Donbas in past day {{!}} No casualties have been reported. |date=22 July 2018 |accessdate=22 July 2018}} A series of ceasefire violations carried out by Ukrainian forces were recorded by pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city. In the main incidents, Pikuzy was shelled from 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 120 mm mortars, while Sakhanka was likewise the target of 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 82 mm mortars. Yasynuvata was hit by 120 mm mortar rounds.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32337|title=ВСУ продолжают обстреливать Коминтерново и Саханку из минометов - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=21 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}}{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32327|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Саханке - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=21 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}}{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32336|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Коминтерново - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=21 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}} === 22 July === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 15 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 11 occasions in Donetsk region and on 4 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 6 occasions. By morning of 22 July five ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side; the fire was not returned. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 21 July.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/07/22/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-22-iyulya-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 22 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 22 July 2018|date=22 July 2018 |accessdate=22 July 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:42 22/07/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported nine Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in four different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/wall-95168042_32339|title=В зоне обстрела со стороны ВСУ оказались Коминтерново, Ленинское, Саханка и Ясиноватая - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=22 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when antitank rockets landed in Lozove.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/07/22/lnr-operativnaya-svodka-obstrelyan-poselok-lozovoe-2/|title=ЛНР: оперативная сводка – обстрелян поселок Лозовое|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-07-22|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 4 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/420226105136678 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 22 ЛИПНЯ 2018 РОКУ року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-22 |accessdate=2018-07-22 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 15 ceasefire violations were registered. Talakivka, Vodiane, Shyrokyne, Hnutove, Lebedinske and Starohnativka became the target of small arms and rocket launchers. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Ukrainian forces at Zaitseve and Krymske were attacked with infantry weapons and rocket launchers. Ukrainian troops at Mayorsk received small arms fire. Sniper fire was reported at Novooleksandrivka.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/07/23/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-23-lipnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 23 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-07-23 |access-date=2018-07-23 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.unian.info/war/10197354-donbas-update-ukraine-reports-1-wia-amid-15-enemy-attacks.html |publisher=UNIAN|title=Donbas update: Ukraine reports 1 WIA amid 15 enemy attacks {{!}} Two enemy troops were reportedly wounded in clashes with Ukraine's Joint Forces. |date=23 July 2018 |accessdate=23 July 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2503649-militants-launched-15-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 15 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=23 July 2018 |accessdate=23 July 2018}} Pro-Russian authorities from Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire several times by evening. In the main incidents, BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Hnutove riddled pro-Russian positions at Novyboeve with 30 mm gunfire, and Sakhanka was shelled with 82 mm mortars. BMP-1 armoured vehicles from Talakivka opened fire on Pikuzy.{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/dnr_online_ru?w=wall-95168042_32340|title=ВСУ обстреливают населенные пункты Республики - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=22 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}}{{Cite web|url=https://vk.com/dnr_online_ru?w=wall-95168042_32344|title=ВСУ обстреляли Коминтерново и Саханку - СЦКК|last=|first=|date=22 July 2018|website=vk.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2018-07-22}} === 23 July === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 15 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 12 occasions in Donetsk and on 3 occasions in Luhansk region). In Spartak, two 120 mm mortar rounds struck Ukrainian redoubts, while BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Novotroitske engaged pro-Russian positions at Dokuchaievsk.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovany-obstrely-so-storony-vsu-po-dokuchaevsku-i-spartaku-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Докучаевск и Спартак {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-07-28|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-07-29|language=ru-RU}} === 29 July === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 25 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 14 occasions in Donetsk and on 11 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 7 occasions. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, antitank rocket launchers and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions at Zholobok and Lozove.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2516-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-31-iyulja-na-01-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 31 июля на 01 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-02}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 4 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/430320927460529 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 01 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=1 August 2018 |accessdate=1 August 2018 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 21 ceasefire violations were registered, three Ukrainian servicemen were wounded, one went [[missing in action]]. In the surroundings of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian troops opened fire on Ukrainian positions at Talakivka, Novomykhailivka, Lebedinske, Vodiane, Hnutove, Pavlopil and Marinka using infantry weapons and rocket launchers. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian positions at Maisk, Novoluhanske and Krymske supported by small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and antitank rockets. Small arms fire was reported at Stanytsia Luhanska.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/02/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-02-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 02 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-02 |access-date=2018-08-02 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2510040-militants-launched-21-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 21 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=2 August 2018 |accessdate=2 August 2018}} A number of Ukrainian violations of the truce was reported by pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city. Ukrainian forces shelled Luhanske, in the southern outskirts of Donetsk city, and in the area of Horlivka, Dolomitne and Gagarin mining complex with automatic grenade launchers, rocket propelled grenades and 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-dolomitnomu-stskk/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Доломитному {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-01|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-luganskoe-stskk-2/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Луганское - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-01|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-okrestnosti-shahty-gagarina-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли окрестности шахты Гагарина - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-01|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}} === 2 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 21 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 12 occasions in Donetsk and on 9 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 2 August eight ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, two Ukrainian soldiers were wounded. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that three Ukrainian servicemen were wounded and one went missing in action in the Donbass region on the first day of August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/02/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-02-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru|title=ООС: сводные данные – 02 августа 2018|last=|first=|date=2 August 2018|website=mediarnbo.org|publisher=NSDC|language=ru|trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 2 August 2018|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|accessdate=2 August 2018|quote=Posted By: Galat 14:21 02/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials in Donetsk city recorded three Ukrainian violations of the truce in three locations. The Ukrainian military used small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers and antitank rocket launchers.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/za-sutki-vsu-primenili-po-territorii-respubliki-123-boepripasa-povrezhdeny-doma-stskk/|title=За сутки ВСУ обстреляли территорию Республики 3 раза, повреждены дома {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-02|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}} One pro-Russian soldier was killed in action.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/02/bezsonov-ognem-vsu-za-sutki-ubit-odin-voennosluzhashhij-dnr/|title=Безсонов: Огнем ВСУ за сутки убит один военнослужащий ДНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire three times within the republic boundaries. BMP-1 and BMP-2 armoured vehicles launched a sustained attack on pro-Russian positions at Sokolniki supported by 82 mm mortar fire. Heavy machine guns and antitank rocket launchers were fired from the same location at Zholobok and Pryshyb.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2530-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-01-na-02-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 01 на 02 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-02}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 2 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/431356484023640 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 02 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-02 |accessdate=2018-08-02 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 28 ceasefire violations were registered, another two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, Vodiane came under 82 mm mortar fire. Gnutove, Novomykhailivka, Marinka, Chermalyk, Avdiivka, Talakivka, Krasnohorivka, Pavlopil, Lebedinske and Shyrokyne became the target of infantry weapons and rocket propelled grenades. in the northern sector of the demarcation line, pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian redoubts at Novoluhanske, while Krymske, Luhanske and Shumy became the target of infantry weapons and rocket launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/01/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-01-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі прведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 30 липня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=3 August 2018 |accessdate=3 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2510828-militants-launched-28-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 28 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=3 August 2018 |accessdate=3 August 2018}} Pro-Russian officials told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire on two occasions by evening. In the region of Mariupol, BMP-1 armoured vehicles from Talakivka opened fire on pro-Russian positions at Pikuzy, while small arms and sniper fire was reported at Gagarin mining complex, in the outskirts of Horlivka.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/utrom-vsu-obstrelyali-kominternovo-stskk/|title=Утром ВСУ обстреляли Коминтерново - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-02|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-gorlovke-stskk-3/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Горловке {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-02|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-02|language=ru-RU}} === 3 August === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 28 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 20 occasions in Donetsk region and on 8 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 3 August nine ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that four Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 2 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/03/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-03-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru|title=ООС: сводные данные – 03 августа 2018|last=|first=|date=3 August 2018|website=mediarnbo.org|publisher=NSDC|language=ru|trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 3 August 2018|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|accessdate=3 August 2018|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:46 03/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials in Donetsk city recorded two Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire. Ukrainian forces used sniper rifles and armoured fighting vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions at two different locations.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelivali-gorlovku-i-kominternovo-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреливали Горловку и Коминтерново - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-03|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-03|language=ru-RU}} The same sources recorded 27 incidents over the past week; the Ukrainian military fired 69 shells from 82 mm and 120 mm mortars and 183 rounds from armoured fighting vehicles on the same period. One pro-Russian soldier was killed in action.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/03/vsu-poryadka-tridtsati-raz-za-nedelyu-narushili-rezhim-tishiny-v-dnr/|title=ВСУ порядка тридцати раз за неделю нарушили режим тишины в ДНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-03|language=ru-RU}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire two times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed 82 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to pound pro-Russian positions at Krasny Yar and Zholobok.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2536-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-02-na-03-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 02 на 03 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-03}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 6 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/432288280597127 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 03 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=3 August 2018 |accessdate=3 August 2018 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 36 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city and the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian [[T-64|tanks]], supported by 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire, launched an intense attack on Ukrainian redoubts at Pavlopil. Nearby Talakivka was hit by 82 mm mortar rounds. Infantry weapons and rocket launchers were fired at Krasnohorivka, Hnutove, Pavlopil, Vodiane, Shyrokyne and Lebedinske. In the northern section of the demarcation line, 82 mm mortar volleys landed in Krymske, while small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers were fired at Makarove, Novoluhanske, Yuzhne, Zalizne, Luhanske and Svitlodarsk.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/04/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-04-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 04 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-04 |access-date=2018-08-04 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} A number of Ukrainian violations of the truce were reported by pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city by evening. In the region of Mariupol, Sosnovske was hit by automatically launched grenades and antitank rockets, while in the surroundings of Donetsk city, Vasiilivka was shelled with automatic grenade launcher and 82 mm mortars.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-iz-granatometov-obstrelyali-sosnovskoe-stskk/|title=ВСУ из гранатометов обстреляли Сосновское - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-03|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-04|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-vasilevku-stskk-4/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Васильевку - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-03|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-04|language=ru-RU}} === 4 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 36 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 22 occasions in Donetsk and on 14 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 4 August eight ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 3 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/04/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=2018-08-04 |access-date=2018-08-04 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported five Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in four locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, antitank rocket launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2554-svodka-ot-sckk-dnr-na-4-avgusta.html|title=Сводка от СЦКК ДНР на 4 Августа|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-04}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire three times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, under-barrel launched grenades, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 120 mm mortars to open fire on pro-Russian positions at Pryshyb, Zholobok, Kalynivka and Krasny Yar.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2552-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-3-na-4-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 3 на 4 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-04}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 8 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/433290223830266 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 04 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-04 |accessdate=2018-08-04 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 33 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was killed, two were wounded. In the area of Donetsk city and the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles attacked Ukrainian positions supported by small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. Most incidents took place at Marinka, Vodiane, Avdiivka, Shyrokyne, Chermalyk and Hnutove. Ukrainian forces at Shyrokyne also became the target of 82 mm mortars. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Ukrainian troops at Krymske, Novozvanivka, Novoluhanske and Troitske were engaged by armoured fighting vehicles, grenade launchers and infantry weapons.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/05/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-05-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 05 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=5 August 2018 |accessdate=5 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Two patrolling policemen from the [[Dnipro-1 Regiment|“Dnipro-1” police regiment]] were injured by a sniper fire at [[Marinka, Ukraine|Marinka]] at around 11:00 am.{{cite web|url=https://en.censor.net.ua/photo_news/3079872/bullets_hit_armor_stocks_of_their_assault_rifles_interior_ministry_shows_policemen_who_survived_sniper |title="Bullets hit armor, stocks of their assault rifles," – Interior Ministry shows policemen who survived sniper attack in Marinka. PHOTOS|date=2018-08-06 |accessdate=2018-08-09 |website=en.censor.net.ua}} Pro-Russian authorities from Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire on several occasions by evening. Trudivske, Yasynuvata and Spartak, in the outskirts of donetsk city, Dolomitne and Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, and in the region of Mariupol, Novoshyrokivske and Sakhanka, came under hostile fire. In the main incidents, 120 mm mortar rounds hit Yasynuvata, while BMP-2 armoured fighting vehicles from Avdiivka engaged pro-Russian positions at Spartak. Novotoshyrokivske, Sakhanka and Trudivske were shelled with 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovany-obstrely-so-storony-vsu-po-gorlovke-i-dolomitnomu-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Горловку и Доломитное {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-04|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-04|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-ryad-naselennyh-punktov-dnr-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли ряд населенных пунктов ДНР {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-04|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-04|language=ru-RU}} === 5 August === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 33 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 21 occasions in Donetsk region and on 12 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 15 occasions. By morning of 5 August four ceasefire violations were registered, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded; the fire was returned on 3 occasions. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian soldier was killed and another two were wounded in the Donbass region on 4 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/05/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=5 August 2018 |accessdate=5 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city recorded seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in seven different locations using small arms, snipers, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-zone-obstrela-vsu-okazalis-gorlovka-dolomitnoe-yasinovataya-spartak-trudovskie-sahanka-oktyabr-stskk/|title=В зоне обстрела ВСУ оказались Горловка Доломитное, Ясиноватая, Спартак, Трудовские, Саханка, Октябрь - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-05|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-05|language=ru-RU}} Local officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic recorded two Ukrainian attacks on pro-Russian positions. Automatic grenade launchers, antitank rocket launchers, antitank rocket launchers and 82 mm mortars were fired at pro-Russian positions around Kalynivka and Kalynove.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2565-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-4-na-5-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 4 на 5 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-05}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 12 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian servicemen was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/434298357062786 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 05 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=5 August 2018 |accessdate=5 August 2018 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day a total of 40 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area of Donetsk city and the region of Mariupol, Hnutove and Lebedinske were hit by 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire. Separatist forces fired small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers at Ukrainian positions around Shyrokyne, Lebedinske, Pavlopil, Chermalyk, Marinka and Vodiane. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Krymske was repeatedly attacked with infantry weapons, grenade launchers and 82 mm mortars. Elsewhere pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles, supported by infantry weapons and rocket launchers, engaged Ukrainian positions at Svitlodarsk, Luhanske, Yuzhne and Novozvanivka. {{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/06/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-06-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 06 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-06 |access-date=2018-08-06 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2512114-militants-launched-40-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 40 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=6 August 2018 |accessdate=6 August 2018}} A series of Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire were reported by pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city by evening. Mineralne, in the surroundings of Donetsk city, Holmivsky and Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, and in the region of Mariupol, Sakhanka, Pikuzy and Uzhivka became the target of Ukrainian forces. In the main incidents, BMP-1 and BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Dzerzhinsky launched a sustained attack on pro-Russian positions at Gagarin mining complex. BMP-1 armoured vehicles, meanwhile, engaged pro-Russian forces at Holmivsky and Sakhanka. The Ukrainian military shelled Uzhivka and Sakhanka with 82 mm mortars.
