In the northern section of the demarcation line, Novoluhanske was shelled with 82 mm mortars. Small arms, heavy machine guns and grenade launchers were fired at Novozvanovka, Majororsk, Novotoshkovskoe, Krymske, Novolugansk, Zaitseve and Troitske. Ukrainian troops at Stanytsia Luhanske were harassed with small arms fire from pro-Russian positions at Knyaz Igor memorial.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/10/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-10-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 10 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-10 |access-date=2018-08-10 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2515158-militants-launched-45-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 45 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=10 August 2018 |accessdate=10 August 2018}} By evening, a number of Ukrainian ceasefire violations had been reported by pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city. In the main incidents, all of them in the region of Mariupol, Uzhivka and Sakhanka were hit by 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire respectively, while BMP-1 armoured vehicles from Talakivka opened fire on Ukrainian positions at Pikuzy.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-sahanke-stskk-3/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Саханке {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-09|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-10|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-leninskoe-stskk-5/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Ленинское {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-09|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-10|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-strelyali-po-kominternovo-iz-bmp-stskk/|title=ВСУ стреляли по Коминтерново из БМП {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-09|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-10|language=ru-RU}} === 10 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 45 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 24 occasions in Donetsk and on 21 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 10 August four ceasefire violations were registered, exclusively in Donetsk region; no casualties were reported. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was killed and two were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 9 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/10/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-10-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 08 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 10 August 2018|date=10 August 2018 |accessdate=10 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:58 10/08/2018}} The same sources said that the Ukrainian military broke the ceasefire 45 times over the past week. The Ukrainian forces fired 100 shells from 82 mm and 120 mm mortars and 206 rounds from armoured fighting vehicles on the same period. Three pro-Russian soldiers were killed in action.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/za-nedelyu-obstrelami-vsu-povrezhdeno-18-domostroenij-ranen-mirnyj-zhitel-pogiblo-tri-zashhitnika-dnr-eduard-basurin/|title=За неделю обстрелами ВСУ повреждено 18 домостроений, ранен мирный житель, погибло три защитника ДНР – Эдуард Басурин {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-10|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-27|language=ru-RU}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported three Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three locations using 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-techenie-sutok-vsu-obstrelivali-sahanku-leninskoe-i-kominternovo-povrezhdeny-doma-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреливали Саханку, Ленинское, и Коминтерново {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-10|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-10|language=ru-RU}} Authorities from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire four times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Kalynivka, Kalynove, Pryshyb and Lozove.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2624-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-09-na-10-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=ОПЕРАТИВНАЯ СВОДКА ЗА СУТКИ С 09 НА 10 АВГУСТА от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-10}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 10 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/10/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-1800-10-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 18:00 10 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-10 |access-date=2018-08-10 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 36 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, another two Ukrainian soldiers were wounded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, antitank rockets and 120 mm mortar rounds hit Ukrainian positions at Lebedinske, while pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian forces at Hnutove. Ukrainian troops at Opytne, Novomykhailivka, Shyrokyne, Pavlopil, Bohdanivka, Lebedinske, Vodiane, Krasnohorivka, Hnutove and Marinka were harassed with small arms and heavy machine gun fire. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Shumy was struck by 120 mm mortar rounds. Zalizne, Krymske, Shumy, Luhanske and Troitske became meanwhile the target of infantry weapons and rocket propelled grenades.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/11/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-11-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 11 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=11 August 2018 |accessdate=11 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the truce on a number of occasions by evening. The Ukrainian military targeted Pikuzy and Uzhivka, in the region of Mariupol, and 6/7 mining complex, in the area of Horlivka. In the main incidents, Pikuzy was shelled with 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 120 mm mortars; 120 mm mortar rounds also struck Uzhivka. BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Shumy launched a sustained attack on pro-Russian redoubts at 6/7 mining complex supported by heavy 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-kominternovo-gorlovku-i-leninskoe-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Коминтерново, Горловку и Ленинское - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-10|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-10|language=ru-RU}} === 11 August === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 36 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 24 occasions in Donetsk region and on 12 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 11 August seven ceasefire violations were registered. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that three Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 10 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/11/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-11-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 11 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 11 August 2018|date=11 August 2018 |accessdate=11 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 13:15 09/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded six Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three different locations using small arms, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/za-sutki-vsu-primenili-po-territorii-respubliki-bolee-190-boepripasov-stskk/|title=За сутки ВСУ применили по территории Республики более 190 боеприпасов {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-11|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-11|language=ru-RU}} Authorities from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire four times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions at Lohvynove, Pryshyb and Zholobok.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2640-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-10-na-11-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 10 на 11 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-11}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 15 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/440152913143997 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 11 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=11 August 2018 |accessdate=11 August 2018 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 34 ceasefire violations were recorded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and Mariupol, Ukrainian positions around Hnutove were pounded by 122 mm self-propelled artillery. Lebedinske, meanwhile, was hit by 120 mm mortar rounds. Antitank guided missiles were fired at Pavlopil and Lebedinske.Novotroitskye Vodiane, Bohdanivka, Chermalyk, Krasnohorivka, Hranitne, Novomykhailivka and Shyrokyne became the target of infaantry weapons and grenade launchers. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Krymske was the target of 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled guns. separatist forces fired infantry weapons and rocket launchers at Novhorodske, Novooleksandrivka, Luhanske, Svitlodarsk, Novotoshkivske and Novozvanivka.{{Cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/12/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-12-serpnya-2018-roku/|title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 12 серпня 2018 року|website=Міністерство оборони України|access-date=2018-08-12}} Pro-Russian sources reported a number of Ukrainian violations of the truce by evening. Staromykhailivka, in the southern outskirts of Donetsk city, was shelled with 120 mm mortars; two civilian residences were set on fire.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-staromihajlovke-stskk/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Старомихайловке {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-11|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-12|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite web|url=https://dan-news.info/defence/dva-domostroeniya-povrezhdeny-na-zapade-donecka-v-rezultate-minometnogo-ognya-so-storony-vsu-sckk.html|title=Два домостроения повреждены на западе Донецка в результате минометного огня со стороны ВСУ – СЦКК {{!}} ДАН|website=dan-news.info|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-08-12}} In the territory of the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic, armoured fighting vehicles from Novotoshkivke attacked pro-Russian positions at Donetskyi supported by 82 mm mortar fire. A number of civilian buildings were hit.{{Cite web|url=https://novorosinform.org/734636|title=Украинские боевики из минометов обстреляли Донецкий — есть разрушения|website=Новороссия|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-08-12}} The OSCE mission announced that their monitors had spotted “four distinct electronic warfare systems” near [[Chornukhyne]], in an area controlled by the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic. The Russian-made devices were identified by an OSCE drone as "Leer-3 RB-341V, 1L269 Krasukha, and RB-109A Bylina units as well as the mobile anti-drone system Repellent-1".{{Cite web|url=https://www.osce.org/special-monitoring-mission-to-ukraine/390236|title=Latest from the OSCE Special Monitoring Mission to Ukraine (SMM), based on information received as of 19:30, 10 August 2018 {{!}} OSCE|website=www.osce.org|language=en|access-date=2018-08-17}} === 12 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 34 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 23 occasions in Donetsk region and on 11 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By the morning of 12 August three ceasefire violations were recorded. Pro-Russian officials in Donetsk city recorded two Ukrainian violations of the truce. The Ukrainian military used 82 mm and 120 mm mortars to shell Sosnovske and Staromykhailivka.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-zone-obstrela-so-storony-vsu-okazalis-sosnovskoe-i-staromihajlovka-stskk/|title=В зоне обстрела со стороны ВСУ оказались Сосновское и Старомихайловка. {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-12|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-12|language=ru-RU}} Within the boundaries of the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic, local sources said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when BMP-1 armoured vehicles from Novotoshkivke launched an attack on Donetskyi, supported by 82 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2653-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-11-na-12-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 11 на 12 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-12}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 20 occasions, as a result, two Ukrainian serviceman were wounded.{{Cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/photos/a.364697644022858.1073741828.364683177357638/441152823044006/?type=3&theater|title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint Forces Operation|website=www.facebook.com|language=en|access-date=2018-08-12}} By the end of the day total 57 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, heavy shelling was reported at Hnutove, which became the target of 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled artillery, while Vodiane and Lebedinske came under 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire. Ukrainian positions at hnutove were also attacked by armoured fighting vehicles. Light weapons were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Avdiivka, Marinka, Nikolaevka, Novomykhailvka, Novotroitske, Opytne, Pavlopil, Chermalyk and Shyrokyne. Sniper fire was reported at Nikolaevka. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Luhanske and Mayorsk were shelled with 120 mm mortars, while Krymske and Zaitseve came under 82 mm mortar fire. Pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian positions at Yuzhne. Infantry weapons and rocket launchers were fired at Zolote, Yuzhne, Svitlodarsk, Novotoshkivke and Novoluhanske.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/13/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczi-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-13-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операцї Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 13 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=13 August 2018 |accessdate=13 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{Cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/13/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-13-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru|title=ООС: сводные данные – 13 августа 2018 – Информационно-аналитический центр|website=mediarnbo.org|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-08-21}} Pro-Russian officials told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the truce on several occasions by evening. Yasynuvata and Spartak, in the surroundings of Donetsk city, Izotove and Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, and in the region of Mariupol, Sosnovske and Uzhivka, came under hostile attack. in the main incidents, Ukrainian tanks from Dzezhinsky engaged pro-Russian redoubts at Izotove, supported by 120 mm mortar fire. Uzhivka was also hit by 120 mm mortar rounds. BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Avdiivka raked pro-Russian positions with 30 mm gunfire, while armoured personnel carriers from the same location attacked pro-Russian forces at Yasynuvata.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-leninskoe-i-sosnovskoe-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Ленинское и Сосновское - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-12|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-12|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-poselok-shahty-gagarina-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли поселок шахты Гагарина - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-12|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-12|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-aktivizirovali-obstrely-naselennyh-punktov-respubliki-stskk/|title=ВСУ активизировали обстрелы населенных пунктов Республики - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-12|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-12|language=ru-RU}} === 13 August === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 57 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 33 occasions in Donetsk region and on 24 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on 27 occasions. By morning of 13 August (as of 9:00 am) ten ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian soldiers were wounded in the Donbass region on 12 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/13/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczi-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-13-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операцї Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 13 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=13 August 2018 |accessdate=13 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city recorded ten Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in ten different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, snipers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers, armoured fighting vehicles and tanks.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-desyat-raz-narushili-rezhim-prekrashheniya-ognya-povrezhdeny-doma-i-kotelnaya-stskk/|title=ВСУ десять раз нарушили режим прекращения огня, повреждены дома и котельная - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-13|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-13|language=ru-RU}} Authorities from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire four times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Lozove, Sentianivka and Kalynivka.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2663-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-12-na-13-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 12 на 13 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-13}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 14 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/442168552942433 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 13 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=13 August 2018 |accessdate=13 August 2018 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 41 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, Bohdanivka was shelled with 120 mm mortars, while Vodiane and Avdiivka came under 82 mm mortar fire. Lebedinske, Shyrokyne, Vodiane, Novotroitske, Hnutove, Avdiivka, Pavlopil and Opytne became the target of infantry weapons and grenade launchers. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, Pro-Russian sources shelled Novotoshkivske with 122 mm self-propelled artillery, Severne and Zalizne with 120 mm mortars, and Troitske and Novozvanivka with 82 mm mortars. Small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers were fired at Novoluhanske, Novozvanivka, Yuzhne, Mayorsk, Novotoshkivske, Troitske and Krymske.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/14/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-14-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 14 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-14 |access-date=2018-08-14 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2517233-militants-launched-41-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 41 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=14 August 2018 |accessdate=14 August 2018}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city reported at least two Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire by evening, when Ukrainian forces engaged pro-Russian positions at Dokuchaievsk, in the southern outskirts of Donetsk city, and at Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, using small arms, heavy machine guns, grenade launchers, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless guns, 82 mm mortars and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-dokuchaevsk-stskk-10/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Докучаевск - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-13|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-13|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-vedut-obstrel-poselka-shahty-gagarina-stskk/|title=ВСУ ведут обстрел поселка шахты Гагарина - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-13|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-13|language=ru-RU}} Hours later, Ukrainian tanks opened fire on Izotove, in the surroundings of Horlivka, for the second consecutive day.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/ezhednevnaia-svodka-narushenii-rezhima-prekrashcheniia-ognia-za-period-s-3-00-13-avgusta-po-3-00-14-avgusta-stckk/|title=Ежедневная сводка нарушений режима прекращения огня за период с 3:00 13 августа по 3:00 14 августа - СЦКК|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-14}} === 14 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 41 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 18 occasions in Donetsk and on 23 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 14 August seven ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 13 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/14/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-14-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 14 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 14 August 2018|date=14 August 2018 |accessdate=14 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 13:12 14/08/2018}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city recorded seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, snipers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, antiaircraft artillery, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and tanks. According to local sources, the Ukrainian military broke the ceasefire four times within the borders of the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, antitank rocket launchers, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions at Zholobok, Pryshyb and Kalynove.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/operativnaia-svodka-za-sutki-s-13-na-14-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr/|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 13 на 14 августа от НМ ЛНР|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-15}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 19 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/443197789506176 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 14 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-14 |accessdate=2018-08-14 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 46 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was killed, another three were wounded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, 122 mm artillery barrages were fired at the Ukrainian strongholdsof Hnutove, Vodiane and Shyrokyne. Vodiane was also shelled with 82 mm and 120 mm mortars; 82 mm mortar volleys landed meanwhile in Chermalyk and Lebedinske. Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Krasnohorivka, Opytne, Marinka, Novotroitske, Pisky, Pavlopil, Chermalyk, Hnutove, Vodiane, Shyrokyne and Lebedinske. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Krymske came under attack from heavy machine guns, rocket launchers, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured fighting vehicles and 152 mm self-propelled artillery. Zaitseve was hit by 82 mm mortar rounds, and Mayorsk came under 120 mm mortar fire. Small arms, heavy machine guns and antitank rocket launchers were fired at Ukrainian positions around Zaitseve, Troitske, Zolote, Svitlodarsk and Mayorsk.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/15/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-15-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операцї Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 15 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=15 August 2018 |accessdate=15 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2518016-militants-launched-46-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 44 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=15 August 2018 |accessdate=15 August 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.rferl.org/a/kyiv-says-ukrainian-soldier-killed-in-east/29435222.html |title=Kyiv Says Ukrainian Soldier Killed In East |publisher=[[Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty|REF/RL]] |date=6 July 2018 |accessdate=6 July 2018}} Pro-Russian officials from Donetsk city reported a series of Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire by evening. Ukrainian forces attacked Spartak, in the outskirts of Donetsk city, and, in the region of Mariupol, Sakhanka, Nova Tavrya and Pikuzy. In the main incidents, 82 mm and 120 mm mortar volleys landed in Pikuzy, while Sakhanka and Nova Tavrya came under 82 mm mortar fire. Pro-Russian troops at Pikuzy were also engaged by BMP-1 armoured vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-ryad-naselennyh-punktov-respubliki-stskk-5/|title=ВСУ обстреляли ряд населенных пунктов Республики {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-14|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-15|language=ru-RU}} Later in the night, Izotove, in the area of Horlivka, came under 82 mm mortar fire. BMP-2 armoured vehicles opened fire on the pro-Russian strongholds of Trudivske and Staromyhailivka, around Donetsk city, causing extensive damaged to residential buildings and a gas pipeline.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/ezhednevnaia-svodka-narushenii-rezhima-prekrashcheniia-ognia-za-period-s-3-00-14-avgusta-po-3-00-15-avgusta-stckk/|title=Ежедневная сводка нарушений режима прекращения огня за период с 3:00 14 августа по 3:00 15 августа - СЦКК|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-16}} === 15 August === According to the information provided by the press-centre of the JFO headquarters in the morning pro-Russian forces had opened fire on 46 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 31 occasions in Donetsk region and on 15 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 15 August six ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed reported at noon that one Ukrainian soldier was killed and three Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 14 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/15/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=15 August 2018 |accessdate=15 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/15/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-15-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 15 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 15 August 2018|date=15 August 2018 |accessdate=15 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 14:14 15/08/2018}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city recorded ten Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in different locations using small arms, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles. Two civilian residents were wounded. Officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire two times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Sentianivka.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/operativnaia-svodka-za-sutki-s-14-na-15-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr/|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 14 на 15 августа от НМ ЛНР|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-16}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 16 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/444290666063555 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 15 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-15 |accessdate=2018-08-15 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 43 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded. In the surroundings of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, heavy sheling was reported at Hnutove, which became the target of 82 mm and 120 mm mortars. Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were fired at Ukrainian positions around Marinka, Shyrokyne, Avdiivka, Chermalyk, Hnutove, Novotroitske, Novomyhailivka, Lebedinske, Opytne, Pavlopil, Vodiane, Krasnohorivka, Pisky and Kamianka. In the northern section of the demarcation line, 120 m mortar rounds hit Svitlodarsk, while Luhanske and Krymske came under 82 mm mortar fire. Infantry weapons were employed to harass Ukrainian troops at Krymske, Luhanske, Novoluhanske, Mayorsk and Novozvanivka. Small arms was reported at Stanytsia Luhanska.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/16/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-16-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 16 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-16 |access-date=2018-08-16 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2518787-militants-launched-43-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 43 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=16 August 2018 |accessdate=16 August 2018}} Pro-Russian authorities told the press that Ukrainian forces had opened fire on pro-Russian positions at Uzhivka and Sakhanka, in the region of Mariupol, and Dolomitne, in the area around Horlivka. In the main incidents, Sakhanka was shelled with automatic grenade launchers while Dolomitne became the target of 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/45407-2/|title=Утром зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по Ленинскому — СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-15|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-16|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-vsu-po-napravleniiu-novoluganskoe-dolomitnoe-1/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Новолуганское - Доломитное|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-16}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-shirokino-sakhanka-3/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Широкино - Саханка|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-16}} === 16 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 43 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 24 occasions in Donetsk and on 19 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 16 August five ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 15 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/16/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=16 August 2018 |accessdate=16 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/16/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-16-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 16 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 16 August 2018|date=16 August 2018 |accessdate=16 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 14:23 16/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported three Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three locations using small arms, snipers, automatic grenade launchers and 73 mm antitank recoilless guns.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/za-sutki-vsu-primenili-po-territorii-respubliki-39-boepripasov-stskk/|title=За сутки ВСУ применили по территории Республики 39 боеприпасов — СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-16|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-16|language=ru-RU}} One pro-Russian soldier was killed by sniper fire.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/na-yuzhnom-napravlenii-vnov-obstrelyany-mirnye-poselki-ubit-voennosluzhashhij-daniil-bezsonov/|title=На южном направлении обстреляны мирные поселки, убит военнослужащий {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-16|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-18|language=ru-RU}} Authorities from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire two times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Kalynivka. One pro-Russian soldier was killed in action.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/operativnaia-svodka-za-sutki-s-15-na-16-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr/|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 15 на 16 августа от НМ ЛНР|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-16}}{{Cite web|url=https://novorosinform.org/735322|title=ВСУ выпустили по ЛНР более 80 мин и снарядов за сутки — погиб защитник Донбасса|website=Новороссия|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-08-16}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 6 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/445236819302273 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 16 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-16 |accessdate=2018-08-16 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 30 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area around Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian forces attacked Ukrainian troops at Lebedinske, Novotroitske, Krasnohorivka, Marinka, Hnutove, Shyrokyne, Pavlopil and Vodiane with small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, a 13 [[BM-21 Grad]] rocket barrage was launched from Debaltseve at Ukrainian positions near Svitlodarsk, followed by 120 mm mortar volleys. Luhansk, Krymske and Novhorodske came under 82 mm mortar fire, while pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian redoubts at Krymske. Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Novozvanivka, Luhanske and Novhorodske. One Russian [[Orlan-10]] drone was shot down near [[Pervomaisk, Luhansk Oblast|Pervomaisk]].{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/17/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-17-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 14 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-17 |access-date=2018-08-17 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2519544-militants-launched-30-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 30 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=17 August 2018 |accessdate=17 August 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://en.censor.net.ua/news/3081748/russian_uav_equipped_with_advanced_panoramic_camera_shot_down_by_ukrainian_soldiers_in_donbas_photos |title=Russian UAV equipped with advanced panoramic camera shot down by Ukrainian soldiers in Donbas. PHOTOS|date=2018-08-17 |accessdate=2018-08-18|publisher=Censor.NET}} Pro-Russian sources said that Ukrainian forces had attacked Pikuzy on two different occasions by evening, using small arms, heavy machine guns, snipers and automatic grenade launchers.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-talakovka-kominternovo-5/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Талаковка - Коминтерново|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-17}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-povtornyi-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-talakovka-kominternovo/|title=Зафиксирован повторный обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Талаковка - Коминтерново|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-17}} === 17 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 30 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 18 occasions in Donetsk and on 12 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 17 August eleven ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon no casualties in the Donbass region on 16 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/17/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-17-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 17 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 17 August 2018|date=17 August 2018 |accessdate=17 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:47 17/08/2018}} Pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city reported four Ukrainian violations of the truce in three different settlements. The incidents involved the use of small arms, heavy machine guns, snipers, automatic grenade launchers and 82 mm mortars.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2724-ezhednevnaja-svodka-narushenii-rezhima-prekraschenija-ognja-za-period-s-3-00-16-avgusta-po-3-00.html|title=ЕЖЕДНЕВНАЯ СВОДКА НАРУШЕНИЙ РЕЖИМА ПРЕКРАЩЕНИЯ ОГНЯ ЗА ПЕРИОД С 3:00 16 АВГУСТА ПО 3:00 17 АВГУСТА|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-18}} During the past week, the Ukrainian side breached the ceasefire agreement on 45 occasions. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-18|language=ru-RU}} Officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire two times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, rocket launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles and 120 mm mortars to open fire on pro-Russian positions at Lohvynove and Sentianivka.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2719-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-16-na-17-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 16 на 17 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-18}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 14 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/446219602537328 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 17 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-17 |accessdate=2018-08-17 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 40 ceasefire violations were registered, another Ukrainian serviceman was wounded. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 21 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/22/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=22 August 2018 |accessdate=22 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city recorded seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in five locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-sem-narushili-rezhim-prekrashheniya-ognya-stskk/|title=ВСУ семь нарушили режим прекращения огня - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-22|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-22|language=ru-RU}} Officials from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic said that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire once, when 120 mm mortars firing from Krymske hit pro-Russian positions at Zholobok.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/22/lnr-obstanovka-na-linii-soprikosnoveniya-za-sutki-karta-obstrelov-22-avgusta-2018/|title=ЛНР. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-22|language=ru-RU}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 5 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/451262905366331 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 18:00 22 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-22 |accessdate=2018-08-22 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 24 ceasefire violations were registered, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded;{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/451791368646818 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Ранкове зведення на 07:00 23 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-23 |accessdate=2018-08-23 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/23/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-23-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 23 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-23 |access-date=2018-08-23 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2523176-militants-launched-24-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 24 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=23 August 2018 |accessdate=23 August 2018}} the casualty occurred at [[Starohnativka]] at around 3:00 am. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, Ukrainian troops at Hnutove, Pavlopil, Marinka, Opytne, Starohnativka, Vodiane and Lebedinske were harassed with small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and grenade launchers. Pisky came under 82 mm mortar fire, while Hnutove was shelled with 122 mm self-propelled artillery. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Krymske was hit by 120 mm mortar fire. Katerinivka and Krymske became the target of heavy machine guns and rocket launchers. Small arms fire was reported at Stanytsia Luhanska. A new ceasefire to be implemented on 29 August in coincidence with the beginning of the school year was agreed at Minsk by the warring factions.{{Cite news|url=http://tass.com/world/1018259|title=New ceasefire declared in Donbass ahead of new school year start|work=TASS|access-date=2018-08-24|language=ru}} === 23 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 24 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 17 occasions in Donetsk and on 7 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By noon of 23 August (as of 1:00 pm) 12 ceasefire violations were registered, one Ukrainian soldier was killed at Starohnativka at around 2:00 am. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded in action in the Donbass region on 22 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/23/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-situaczii-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=23 August 2018 |accessdate=23 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} In addition to the aforesaid the spokesman added at noon that four Ukrainian servicemen were killed and six others were wounded in a three-hour engagement between the warring parties at [[Krymske, Novoaidar Raion|Krymske]] that started at around 6:00 am.{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2523537-four-killed-seven-wounded-in-fivehour-clash-in-donbas-hutsuliak.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Four killed, seven wounded in five-hour clash in Donbas - Hutsuliak |date=23 August 2018 |accessdate=23 August 2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.bbc.com/ukrainian/news-45280184 |title=Бойовики атакували на Донбасі: п'ятеро військових загинули |trans-title= |date=2018-08-23 |accessdate=2018-08-23 |publisher=[[BBC Ukrainian]] |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/videos/2077759949220270/ |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Daily Statement |trans-title= |date=2018-08-23 |accessdate=2018-08-23 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk|quote=На жаль, в ході ведення бойових дій загинуло чотири та поранено шість військовослужбовців Об'єднаних сил. Станом на 9:00 обстановка в цьому районі стабілізована.}}{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/23/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-23-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 23 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 23 August 2018|date=23 August 2018 |accessdate=23 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 14:45 23/08/2018}}{{cite web|url=https://www.rferl.org/a/five-ukrainian-soldiers-killed-in-fighting-in-eastern-ukraine/29449900.html |title=Five Ukrainian Soldiers Killed In Fighting In Bloodiest Day In Months |publisher=[[Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty|REF/RL]] |date=23 August 2018 |accessdate=23 August 2018}} Ukrainian sources said that pro-Russian troops opened up on their positions with mortars, while pro-Russian officials from the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic reported that their forces shelled Ukrainian infantry attempting to broke through the demarcation line at Zholobok.{{Cite news|url=https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/troops-killed-injured-fighting-eastern-ukraine-57353502|title=4 troops killed, 7 injured in fighting in eastern Ukraine|last=News|first=ABC|work=ABC News|access-date=2018-08-24|language=en}} According to the Ukrainian account, the positions of a Ukrainian armoured brigade along Bakhmutka road, near Krymske, were assaulted by pro-Russian armoured vehicles backed by antitank rockets, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled artillery. The offensive was met by Ukrainian armoured fighting vehicles supported by antitank rocket launchers.{{Cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/23/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-23-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru|title=ООС: сводные данные – 23 августа 2018 – Информационно-аналитический центр|website=mediarnbo.org|language=ru-RU|access-date=2018-08-24}} The brigade counter-attacked the pro-Russian with their mobile reserves.In Donetsk city, pro-Russian sources announced that Ukrainian forces committed one violation of the ceasefire when antitank rockets landed in Vesele.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/23/stskk-vsu-obstrelyali-poselok-veseloe-pod-donetskom/|title=СЦКК: ВСУ обстреляли поселок Веселое под Донецком|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-25|language=ru-RU}} Local officials reported that the Ukrainian military broke the truce two times inside the borders of the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic, using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers and 120 mm mortars to attack pro-Russian troops at Zholobok and Stanytsia Luhanska.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2799-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-22-na-23-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 22 на 23 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-25}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 12 occasions, as a result, total five Ukrainian servicemen were killed and another seven were wounded by 6:00 pm.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/452256868600268 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 18:00 23 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-23 |accessdate=2018-08-23 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 42 ceasefire violations were registered. Besides the pro-Russian assault on Bakhmutka road, the northern section of the demarcation line witnessed heavy shelling on Ukrainian redoubts at Novotoshkivke, which was struck by 120 mm mortar rounds and a barrage of 122 mm artillery volleys. Luhanske came under 82 mm mortar fire. Small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers were used to attack Ukrainian troops at Severne, Krymske, Zalizne, Novhorodske, Luhanske and Troitske. In the area around Donetsk city and the region of Mariupol, 82 mm mortar volleys hit Chermalyk and Lebedinske. Avdiivka, Hnutove, Pavlopil, Chermalyk, Hranitne, Shyrokyne, Pisky, Starohnativka, Lebedinske, Krasnohorivka and Vodiane became the target of infantry weapons and grenade launchers. Hours later, pro-Russian armoured fighting vehicles engaged Ukrainian positions at Hnutove.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/24/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-24-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 24 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-24 |access-date=2018-08-24 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} A number of Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire was reported by pro-Russian authorities at Donetsk city by evening. Pikuzy, in the region of Mariupol, came under fire from 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles. In the outskirts of Horlivka, Dolomitne was hit by 82 mm mortar rounds.{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-talakovka-kominternovo-8/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Талаковка - Коминтерново|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-24}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-so-storony-vsu-po-napravleniiu-metallist-dolomitnoe/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел со стороны ВСУ по направлению Металлист - Доломитное|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-24}}{{Cite web|url=https://donetsk24.su/news/zafiksirovan-obstrel-vsu-po-napravleniiu-talakovka-kominternovo-4/|title=Зафиксирован обстрел ВСУ по направлению Талаковка - Коминтерново|last=24|first=Донецк|website=Донецк 24|language=Russian|access-date=2018-08-24}} Witnesses on the ground also said that Ukrainian forces from Krasnohorivka used heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, mortars and armoured fighting vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions at Staromykhailivka, in the surroundings of Donetsk city.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/23/operativnaya-svodka-dnr-ukrainskie-siloviki-vedut-obstrel-neskolkih-naselennyh-punktov/|title=Оперативная сводка ДНР: украинские силовики ведут обстрел нескольких населенных пунктов|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-24|language=ru-RU}} === 24 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 42 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 28 occasions in Donetsk region and on 14 occasions in Luhansk region); the fire was returned on several occasions. By morning of 24 August (as of 12:00 am) sixteen ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side; one male civilian (born in 1983) was killed by shelling in [[Vrubivka]]. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that five Ukrainian servicemen were killed and seven were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 23 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/24/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-24-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 20 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 24 August 2018|date=24 August 2018 |accessdate=24 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:53 24/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city reported seven Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in four locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/za-sutki-vsu-narushili-rezhim-prekrashheniya-ognya-11-raz-povrezhdeny-doma-stskk/|title=За сутки ВСУ нарушили режим прекращения огня 11 раз, повреждены дома {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-24|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-24|language=ru-RU}} Two pro-Russian soldiers were killed and two others wounded in action.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-rezultate-obstrelov-so-storony-vsu-dvoe-zashhitnikov-respubliki-pogibli-i-dvoe-poluchili-raneniya-eduard-basurin/|title=В результате обстрелов со стороны ВСУ двое защитников Республики погибли {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-24|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-25|language=ru-RU}} The same sources recorded 34 Ukrainian violations over the past week. The Ukrainian army fired 30 rounds from 82 mm and 120 mm mortars and 150 antitank rockets. Ukrainian forces also employed armoured fighting vehicles to attack pro-Russian positions.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/24/za-nedelyu-vsu-sovershili-bolee-tridtsati-obstrelov-dnr/|title=За неделю ВСУ совершили более тридцати обстрелов ДНР|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. Новости Мира России Украины|access-date=2018-08-25|language=ru-RU}} According to local sources, the Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire three times within the borders of the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, antitank rocket launchers, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Zholobok and Donetskyi.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2808-svodka-za-sutki-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Сводка за сутки от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-25}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 18 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was killed and two were wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/453306648495290 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 19:00 24 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-24 |accessdate=2018-08-24 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 39 ceasefire violations were registered, another two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded. In the outskirts of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, 120 mm and 82 mm mortar volleys landed in Vodiane, while 82 mm mortars were fired at Hranitne, Krasnohorivka, Chermalyk and Lebedinske. Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were used to harass Ukrainian troops at Pavlopil, Hnutove, Shyrokyne, Nevelske, Krasnohorivka, Lebedinske, Avdiivka, Vodiane and Pisky. In the northern sector of the demarcation line, pro-Russian forces continued their attacks on Krymske with armoured fighting vehicles supported by heavy machine guns, grenade launchers, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and self-propelled 122 mm artillery. Heavy shelling was also reported on Yuzhne, which became the target of antitank rocket launchers, 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled guns. Ukrainian positions at Svitlodarsk were hit by heavy machien guns and rocket propelled grenades.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/25/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-25-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 25 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-25 |access-date=2018-08-25 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2524473-militants-violated-ceasefire-39-times-in-eastern-ukraine-in-last-day-one-soldier-killed.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants violated ceasefire 39 times in eastern Ukraine in last day, one soldier killed |date=25 August 2018 |accessdate=25 August 2018}} Pro-Russian officials from Donetsk city told the press that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire on several occasions throughout the day. Staromykhailivka, in the surroundings of Donetsk city, Pikuzy, in the region of Mariupol, and Gagarin mining complex, in the area of Horlivka, came under hostile fire. In the main incidents, BMP-1 and BMP-2 armoured vehicles from Krasnohorivka launched a series of attacks on pro-Russian redoubts at Staromykhailivka, while heavy 120 mm mortar fire was reported at Gagarin. By morning of 25 August six ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that one Ukrainian serviceman (born in 1985) was killed and four were wounded in action in the Donbass region on 24 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/25/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-25-avgusta-2018/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 23 августа 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 25 August 2018|date=25 August 2018 |accessdate=25 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:36 25/08/2018}}{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/25/brifing-predstavnika-pres-czentru-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг представника Прес-центру Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=2018-08-25 |access-date=2018-08-25 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded six Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three different locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 73 mm antitank recoilless rifles, 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured personnel carriers and armoured fighting vehicles.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/i-za-obstrelov-vsu-v-staromihajlovke-i-gorlovke-povrezhdeno-svyshe-desyatka-domov-stskk/|title=И-за обстрелов ВСУ в Старомихайловке и Горловке повреждено свыше десятка домов - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-25|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-25|language=ru-RU}} Sources from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic reported that Ukrainian forces broke the ceasefire three times within the republic boundaries. The Ukrainian military employed small arms, heavy machine guns, automatic grenade launchers, 82 mm mortars and BMP-1 armoured vehicles to engage pro-Russian positions at Zholobok, Lohvynove and Pankivka.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2815-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-24-na-25-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 24 на 25 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-25}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 7 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/454091688416786 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 25 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-25 |accessdate=2018-08-25 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day a total of 33 ceasefire violations were registered. In the surroundings of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, 82 mm and 120 mm mortar rounds hit Ukrainian positions at Avdiivka. The separatists used infantry weapons and rocket launchers to harass Ukrainian troops at Marinka, Chermalyk, Pavlopil, Shyrokyne, Novomykhailivka and Hranitne. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Yuzhne, Zaitseve, Krymske and Luhanske came under 82 mm and 120 mm mortar fire, while small arms fire was reported at Zaitseve, Zalizne, Zolote, Krymske, Luhanske, Yuzhne and Shumy.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/26/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-26-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 26 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-26 |access-date=2018-08-26 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} === 26 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 33 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 20 occasions in Donetsk region and on 13 occasions in Luhansk region). By morning of 26 August (as of 9:00 am) eight ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side; the fire was returned on 4 occasions. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence reported at noon that no casualties in the Donbass region on 25 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/26/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=26 August 2018 |accessdate=26 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} There were two Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire, according to pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city. The incidents took place when the positions of the separatists were fired at from rocket launchers at Trudivske and Oleksandrivka, in the outskirts of Donetsk city.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/na-donetskom-napravlenii-vsu-ispolzovali-granatomety-stskk/|title=На донецком направлении ВСУ использовали гранатометы - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-26|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-26|language=ru-RU}} No ceasefire violations were recorded by authorities from the self-proclaimed Luhansk People's Republic.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2832-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-25-na-26-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 25 на 26 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-26}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 6 occasions, the fire was returned on all occasions. In separate incidents one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded by explosion of an explosive device, another soldier was injured under similar circumstances. Two servicemen were killed and one was injured due to improper handling of an explosive device.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/454588265033795 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 26 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-26 |accessdate=2018-08-26 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 23 ceasefire violations were registered, another two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded and two were injured. In the environs of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol pro-Russian forces shelled Hranitne and Vodiane with 92 mm mortars. Lebedinske, Novotroitske and Shyrokyne became the target of small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and antitank rocket launchers. In the northern section of the demarcation line, heavy shelling was reported at Krymske, where Ukrainian positions were hit by 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled artillery. Novotoshkivke and Troitske were struck by 82 mm mortars and ZU-23-2 antiaircraft guns. Ukrainian troops at Luhanske, Novoluhanske and Yuzhne were targeted by infantry weapons and grenade launchers.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/27/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-27-serpnya-2018-rok/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 25 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-27 |access-date=2018-08-27 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2525087-militants-launched-23-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 23 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=27 August 2018 |accessdate=27 August 2018}} === 27 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 23 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 15 occasions in Donetsk and on 8 occasions in Luhansk region). By morning of 27 August (as of 9:00 am) two ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were killed and seven were wounded and injured in the Donbass region on 26 August.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/27/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони України щодо ситуації в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил |trans-title= |date=27 August 2018 |accessdate=27 August 2018 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/27/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-27-iyulya-2018-2/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 27 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 27 August 2018|date=27 August 2018 |accessdate=27 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 14:36 27/08/2018}} Pro-Russian sources at Donetsk city reported that Ukrainian forces had broken the ceasefire once, when pro-Russian positions at Holmivsky were hit by small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and 82 mm mortar rounds. There was damage to civilian property and several power lines were hit.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-golmovskom-posle-obstrela-vsu-polovina-domov-ostalas-bez-sveta-stskk/|title=В Гольмовском после обстрела ВСУ половина домов осталась без света - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-27|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-27|language=ru-RU}} No violations of the ceasefire were denounced by pro-Russian sources within the borders of the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2842-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-26-na-27-avgusta.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 26 на 27 августа|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-27}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 7 occasions, as a result, one Ukrainian serviceman was wounded.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/pressjfo.news/posts/455005151658773 |title=Операція об'єднаних сил / Joint forces operation {{!}} Зведення станом на 18:00 27 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-27 |accessdate=2018-08-27 |publisher=Press-centre of the JFO HQ |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 26 ceasefire violations were registered, another Ukrainian serviceman was wounded. In the surroundings of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian tanks from Uzhivka launched a sustained attack on Ukrainian positions at Lebedinske, supported by 82 mm mortar fire. Nearby Hnutove, meanwhile, became the target of infantry weapons, rocket launchers, 82 mm and 120 mm mortars. Ukrainian troops at Vodiane, Pavlopil, Hnutove, Avdiivka, Shyrokyne, Lebedinske, Novomykhailivka and Krasnohorivka were harassed with small arms fire, heavy machine gun fire and antitank rockets. Hours later, armoured fighting vehicles and 122 mm self-propelled guns opened fire at Hnutove. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Luhanske was shelled with 120 mm mortars and 122 mm artillery, while 82 mm mortar volleys landed in Krymske. Stanytsia Luhanska was targeted by automatic grenade launchers. Infantry weapons and rocket launchers were employed to attack Ukrainian troops at Yuzhne, Zolote, Krymske and Luhanske.{{cite web|url=https://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/28/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-28-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 26 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-28 |access-date=2018-08-28 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2525824-militants-launched-26-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 26 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=28 August 2018 |accessdate=28 August 2018}} Two Ukrainian violations of the truce were recorded by pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city, both of them in the region of Mariupol, where Uzhivka and Sakhanka were hit by 120 mm mortar volleys.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-sahanku-stskk-7/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Саханку - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-27|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-27|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-leninskoe-iz-minometov-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Ленинское из минометов - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-27|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-27|language=ru-RU}} === 28 August === According to the information provided by the spokesman of the Ukrainian operational headquarters in the morning, pro-Russian troops had opened fire on 26 occasions on Ukrainian positions the previous day (including on 16 occasions in Donetsk region and on 10 occasions in Luhansk region). By morning of 28 August seven ceasefire violations were registered with no casualties on the Ukrainian side. The spokesman of the Ministry of Defence confirmed at noon that two Ukrainian servicemen were wounded in the Donbass region on 27 August.{{cite web|url=http://mediarnbo.org/2018/08/28/oos-svodnyie-dannyie-28-iyulya-2018-2/?lang=ru |title=ООС: сводные данные – 28 июля 2018 |trans-title=JFO – Summary information as of 28 August 2018|date=28 August 2018 |accessdate=28 August 2018 |publisher=NSDC |language=ru |website=mediarnbo.org|quote=Posted By: Galat 12:41 28/08/2018}} Pro-Russian officials at Donetsk city recorded four Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire in three locations using small arms, heavy machine guns, snipers, automatic grenade launchers and 120 mm mortars.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/v-zone-obstrela-so-storony-vsu-okazalis-vasilevka-sahanka-leninskoe-stskk/|title=В зоне обстрела со стороны ВСУ оказались Васильевка, Саханка, Ленинское - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-28|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-28|language=ru-RU}} For the third consecutive day, no Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire were recorded in the self-styled Luhansk People's Republic.{{Cite web|url=https://goves.net/news/2851-operativnaja-svodka-za-sutki-s-27-na-28-avgusta-ot-nm-lnr.html|title=Оперативная сводка за сутки с 27 на 28 августа от НМ ЛНР|website=Социальная сеть Новороссии GOVES|access-date=2018-08-29}} The press-centre of the JFO reported in the evening that from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm pro-Russian military had opened fire on positions of Ukrainian troops on 5 occasions, no casualties were reported.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/28/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-1800-28-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 18:00 28 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-28 |access-date=2018-08-28 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}} By the end of the day total 32 ceasefire violations were registered. In the area of Donetsk city and in the region of Mariupol, pro-Russian tanks launched a sustained attack on Ukrainian redoubts at Lebedinske, which some hours later became the target of 82 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled guns. Armoured fighting vehicles engaged meanwhile Ukrainian positions at Hnutove, supported by 120 mm mortars and 122 mm self-propelled artillery; 82 mm and 120 mm mortar rounds also landed in Chermalyk, Novomykhailivka and Vodiane. Small arms, heavy machine guns and rocket launchers were fired at Novomykhailivka, Marinka, Lebedinske, Pavlopil, Hnutove, Avdiivka, Chermalyk and Krasnohorivka. In the northern section of the demarcation line, Novoluhanske became the target of 82 mm mortars, 120 mm mortars, armoured fighting vehicles and 122 mm self-propelled artillery. Novhorodske was shelled with 82 mm mortars, while Troitske was hit by 120 mm mortar rounds.Infantry weapons and grenade launchers were fired at Ukrainian positions around Krymske, Popasna, Yuzhne and Mayorsk.{{cite web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/29/zvedennya-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil-stanom-na-0700-29-serpnya-2018-roku/ |title=Зведення щодо обстановки в районі проведення операції Об’єднаних сил станом на 07:00 25 серпня 2018 року |trans-title= |date=2018-08-29 |access-date=2018-08-29 |publisher=MoD |language=uk}}{{cite web|url=https://www.ukrinform.net/rubric-defense/2526587-militants-launched-32-attacks-on-ukrainian-troops-in-donbas-in-last-day.html |publisher=Ukrinform |title=Militants launched 32 attacks on Ukrainian troops in Donbas in last day |date=29 August 2018 |accessdate=29 August 2018}} Pro-Russian authorities from Donetsk city reported a series of Ukrainian violations of the ceasefire by evening. Olenivka, in the area of Donetsk city, Dolomitne, in the area of Horlivka, and Pikuzy, in the region of Mariupol, came under attack. In the main incidents, Dolomitne was shelled by 152 mm self-propelled artillery, while Pikuzy came under 82 mm mortar fire.{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-dolomitnoe-i-kominternovo-stskk/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Доломитное и Коминтерново - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-28|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-28|language=ru-RU}}{{Cite news|url=https://dnr-online.ru/vsu-obstrelyali-elenovku-stskk-2/|title=ВСУ обстреляли Еленовку - СЦКК {{!}} Официальный сайт ДНР|date=2018-08-28|work=Официальный сайт ДНР|access-date=2018-08-28|language=ru-RU}} In a separate incident, a civilian truck driver was killed when an antitank missile hit his vehicle at Dokuchaievsk, in a limestone mill at the southern outskirts of Donetsk city.{{Cite news|url=https://news-front.info/2018/08/28/mirnyj-zhitel-pogib-v-dokuchaevske-pod-obstrelom-karatelej/|title=Мирный житель погиб в Докучаевске под обстрелом карателей (ФОТО 18+)|work=News Front - Новостной Фронт. web|url=http://www.mil.gov.ua/news/2018/08/29/brifing-rechnika-ministerstva-oboroni-ukraini-shhodo-obstanovki-v-rajoni-provedennya-operaczii-obednanih-sil/ |title=Брифінг речника Міністерства оборони
